Class Animal

java.lang.Object
Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bear, Fish
public abstract class Animal extends Object
Models an animal in the river ecosystem.
Version:
1/27/2024
Author:
Jackson Eshbaugh

      public Animal(int age, Animal.Gender gender)

      Parameters:
      age - The age of the animal
      gender - The gender of the animal

  • Method Details

    • generateRandomGender

      public static Animal.Gender generateRandomGender()
      Generates a random gender. There is a uniformly distributed chance for each gender.
      Returns:
      The random gender, either Gender.MALE or Gender.FEMALE.

    • getAge

      public int getAge()
      Gets the age of this animal.
      Returns:
      The animal's age

    • getGender

      public Animal.Gender getGender()
      Gets the gender of this animal.
      Returns:
      The animal's gender

    • maxAge

      abstract boolean maxAge()
      Determines whether this animal is at its maximum age.
      Returns:
      True if the animal is at its max age, false otherwise.

    • incrAge

      abstract boolean incrAge()
      Increments the animal age by one, if possible.
      Returns:
      True if the operation is successful, false if the operation failed and the age remains as it was.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Renders this animal as a String value of the form TGA, where T is type (fish = F, bear = B), G is gender, and A is age.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The String value "TGA" described above.
